data.persona: I am tourist visiting another kingdom. I come from afar. I have visited the docks and shipyard.
data.description:
You are in the Stonehenge.
Technical and advanced, the enormous stones stand looking as if they are placed on top of each other by divine design. The green grass is a stark contrast to the gray stones hovering in the distance.
There's a stone, a litter, and a green grass here.
The tour guides is here.

You are carrying a bag and a coin purse, and wearing a tunic and a boot.

data.short_motivation: I must stay with the group
data.mid_motivation: I do not want to get lost
data.long_motivation: I must return home in a month and want to see as many sights as possible
